title: White House defends firing of labor official as critics warn of trust erosion
description: White House economic advisers defended President Trump’s firing of Bureau of Labor Statistics Commissioner Erika McEntarfer, noting recent revisions that subtracted 258,000 jobs from May and June. Critics said the firing could undermine confidence in official economic data.

title: Texas Democrats seek to block redistricting vote by leaving state
description: Democratic lawmakers left Texas to deny Republicans the quorum needed to redraw the state’s congressional districts; President Trump said the plan could yield up to five additional Republican seats.

title: Over 3,000 Boeing fighter jet workers go on strike after rejecting contract offer
description: Workers who build Boeing fighter jets walked out after voting down a new labor contract, raising concerns about disruptions to defense production.
